name: Government College for Women, M.A. Road, Srinagar

content.College Info: Government College for Women, M.A. Road, Srinagar, located in Srinagar, is a prestigious B+ NAAC accredited government institution offering world-class arts & science programs. The college is known for its excellent academic standards, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and strong industry connections. Students gain admission through University Entrance and benefit from experienced faculty, modern laboratories, and comprehensive learning resources. The institution maintains high placement rates and provides students with opportunities for research, internships, and skill development programs.
content.Courses:
Courses Offered

  • Undergraduate

    B.A: English Literature, History, Sociology, Economics, Psychology, Islamic Studies, Arabic, Journalism and Mass Communication, Social Work; B.Sc: Medical, Non-Medical, Home Science, Zoology, Botany, Bio-Informatics, Nutrition and Dietetics, Clinical Bio-Chemistry, Food Science and Technology, Information Technology; BCA; Integrated MCA; B.A. (Hons) English, B.A. (Hons) Journalism and Mass Communication; B.Sc (Hons/Research)

  • Postgraduate

    M.Sc Home Science

  • Other

    Bachelor of Nursing, Diploma courses, Certification programs
